channel.title: CVE Feed for corydolphin -- corydolphin/flask-cors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for corydolphin -- corydolphin/flask-cors

item.title: CVE-2024-1681|2024-06-04T18:00:45.486Z -- corydolphin -- corydolphin%2Fflask-cors
item.description: corydolphin/flask-cors is vulnerable to log injection when the log level is set to debug. An attacker can inject fake log entries into the log file by sending a specially crafted GET request containing a CRLF sequence in the request path. This vulnerability allows attackers to corrupt log files, potentially covering tracks of other attacks, confusing log post-processing tools, and forging log entries. The issue is due to improper output neutralization for logs.
